ing: 7 ounces Parma ham, torn into thin strips
des: "This is a very simple and tasty recipe for a beautiful-looking salad which can be an elegant dinner party starter or a mid-day snack."
ins:
Arrange arugula on a large, flat platter.
Top arugula with Parma ham.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
